> Watching the monitors for the shields flickering as the power that fueled
> this them flickered and died. Moving quickly he opened a hatch to the
crawl
> spaces, which weren't much for crawling since they usually were
constructed
> so a bot could stand upright within. Running along this his scanners
looked
> for a hatch leading outside. The "leaders" who owned this base weren't
going
> to be too pleased that someone had slipped inside and tore the wiring from
> thier shield generator...for such comedic ranting Panthos wanted to be on
> the outside of the base and out of turret range...
>

{Panthos}

    Panthos turned another corner and smiled seeing the hatch approaching,
as he moved towards it he became more cautious looking it over slowly. His
chest plate opened revealing the compact version of his energy rifle,
extracting it he began to fire on the hatches hinges and locking mechanism.
He didn't think this faction was completely full of morons and not have
sealed the bases exits tight...no one was that dumb.

    Sighing he set abut his task using the laser to slice through the metal
with each shot until it's energy was expended. He didn't expect it to
complete the job, just weaken the structural integrity of the hatch.
Replacing the weapon in his chest cavity he stepped back and lashed out with
a side kick, his foot/paw smacking hard on the door making it shudder
slightly.

    Shaking his head he moved back some more than ran at the hatch flinging
himself feet first at it, both feet connecting hard breaking the hatch from
it's weakened surroundings. Peeking his head out he looked down the face of
the outside base and dug his claws in slowly scaling downwards towards the
ground far below. This was always a pain of infiltrating and causing
havoc...there was rarely a ground floor exit waiting for him...
